```{r}
d1 <- trax_gp34_v1

d2 <-
  d1 |>
  filter(CGG > 55) |> 
  arrange(`FXTAS Stage`) |> 
  select(
    `FXS ID`,
    `Event Name`,
    `FXTAS Stage`,
    contains("tremor"),
    contains("ataxia"),
    -contains("kinesia"),
    -contains("onset"),
    -contains("missingness"),
    -contains("any tremor")
  )

d2 <- 
  filter()

```
